data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article J. Moubayed-Breil, B. Lods-Crozet (2016): Heleniella helvetica sp. n., a cold stenothermic species inhabiting the upper Rhône catchment in central Switzerland [Diptera, Chironomidae, Orthocladiinae]. Journal of Entomological and Acarological Research 48 (6026): 339-344, DOI: 10.4081/jear.2016.6026|2 occurrences
